divs: sighting detailsi was driving along a road near tysons corner macclain area near the cia. i was sight seeing along a nice road. when in town i dont have time to sight see. i took time out to look around. found a sign that goes to the cia road. i took that road and after awhile of snapping photos of the area. i found the road was really wooded. i was at the top oof a hill and i felt a very strong presence. i was so powerful. on a scale ooooof 1 -100 most humans feel like a 10-20 this was 80%. i looked doen the hill and saw what appeared to be a huge cat with huge yellow eyes. i had a car behide me so i was unable to stop and look around so i took a snap photo of the cat. the cat creature was huge. the eyes were over a foot annd they glowed yellow. its head was looking down the road and it pulled off the edge back down the slope of the road as i got close you could still see the cat creature. the eyes were bigger than a foot. i didnt have much time so i got the camera ready and flash snapped it. i developed iit and forgot all about it till i went looking for my sons iraqi photos and found the virgina road pics. ii found the cat annd realized a alien was on the photo too. it was to the right. it had a gold helmet. silver neck docking area silver pin area to attach helmet and lock it on. red space suit and a gold traingle and and an eye image in the middle of the tringle. i took the photo but did not see the alien, the leggs are silouted\see thru chest upper torso are there. i didnt see alien until i developed it. i cound not belive the detail but its on the negitive and i had two blown up photos to see better detail i have shoown a few but i was at staarcon denver a few weeks ago and showed the mufon booth the picture, they man who wanted tooo see it was not there so i showed them told them .1. i was drivinng a road. 2.the presence of something and then yellow cat eyes.3 a giant cat over 15' my feelings was overpowering from the strong presence of the cat now noot sure iiiiiif it was cat ooor alien oor both. took photo forgot about picture. lasted roughly 45 secs or so
Summary: creature photo later alien in pic found
